title: WCX-SCAM

content: Hello! I have 2 signatures offline with the same private key and I would like to know if my private key is at risk.The attacker knows the difference between k-d of the 2 signaturessignature 1k-d = 0x99efbe8ab7519fb46bf1f6dd4fedf30a7677ccec3c241e72fb2abff5313c779br   0x74fd78ede0ab694817af40f20d560ff9f6c87aa251e5c55970fef4e178d09caas   0x74fd78ede0ab694817af40f20d560ff9f6c87aa251e5c55970fef4e178d09caaz   0x44770e65060202ece64ebe8e44f5d170495957b1e1d18cf7858ccf0e2875b6bepk  02eca578ddd2489b985da93bd038d1f42a4be72095a6139ecd65bdd0a475e5f065signature 2k-d = 0xa2c7aa00be5ba8633bb3d8bbace336d4a64075b3365fbe72fb2abff5313c779br   0x4a4a0513337795fcce89cfb11f961cd8ff446cdb88a3f3767965ac8b9e8da8c4s   0x4a4a0513337795fcce89cfb11f961cd8ff446cdb88a3f3767965ac8b9e8da8c4z   0xc11ac33c48cf04f19be3c37326b09ca1878d1ac7378d6c57fdd6f2fd3b551b53pk  02eca578ddd2489b985da93bd038d1f42a4be72095a6139ecd65bdd0a475e5f065

comments.author: mamuu
comments.body: (s1*r2-s2*r1) %N = 0these signatures have the same root so you can't break them.

comments.author: WCX-SCAM
comments.body: Quote from: ecdsa123 on January 20, 2023, 12:34:34 PMQ: I have 2 signatures offline with the same private key and I would like to know if my private key is at riskA: YesThey were generated without internet access, the device was destroyed and the private key is encryptedI don't think it's risky. RIGHT?
